name: CHUBS 2: Beer Run
description:
CHUBS is low on beer, so he needs to go on a Beer Run.

Help CHUBS chug all the mugs he can chug, but watch out for the obstacles and of course Officer Butz or you'll trip and fall and have to start over. Drink the Green Beer for bonus points.

The challenge is to get as far you can and get the most points in a single run.

Drink the Green Beer for bonus points.

How far can you get?!
